products.name: iPhone 13 Pro
products.description: The latest iPhone with amazing camera capabilities, long battery life, and the powerful A15 Bionic chip. Features a stunning Super Retina XDR display with ProMotion technology for a responsive experience.

products.name: Sony WH-1000XM4
products.description: Industry-leading noise cancellation wireless headphones with 30-hour battery life, touch controls, and exceptional sound quality. Perfect for travel, work, or just enjoying your music without distractions.

products.name: Apple Watch Series 7
products.description: Track your fitness goals with this advanced smartwatch. Features heart rate monitoring, ECG, blood oxygen level tracking, GPS, and water resistance up to 50m. The always-on Retina display is nearly 20% larger than Series 6.

products.name: MacBook Pro M2
products.description: The ultimate developer laptop with the powerful M2 chip, stunning Liquid Retina XDR display, and all-day battery life. Features a 14-inch display, 16GB unified memory, and 512GB SSD storage.

products.name: PlayStation 5
products.description: Experience lightning-fast loading with an ultra-high speed SSD, deeper immersion with haptic feedback, adaptive triggers, and 3D audio, and an all-new generation of incredible PlayStation games.

products.name: Samsung QLED 4K TV
products.description: Quantum Dot technology delivers our most realistic picture. Direct Full Array features concentrated zones of precision-controlled LEDs that adjust automatically for deeper blacks and pure whites.
